title: Colorado Springs, Colorado
summary: The City of Colorado Springs is a home-rule municipality that is the county seat and the most populous city of El Paso County, Colorado, United States.[1] The city population was 478,961 at the 2020 United States Census, a +15.02% increase since the 2010 United States Census.[7] Colorado Springs is the second-most populous city and the most extensive city in the State of Colorado. It is the principal city of the Colorado Springs, CO Metropolitan Statistical Area and the second-most prominent city of the Front Range Urban Corridor. It is located in east-central Colorado, on Fountain Creek, 70 miles (113Â km) south of Denver.
